message: It's like every week we read about some young person losing their life so senselessly. I can't imagine the heartbreak their family and friends are going through and I hope I never have to. R.I.P. beautiful girl.

Hillary Clinton has never accomplished anything that has been a benefit to me. She has done things that have negatively impacted my life. Her and Bill's dealings with the laws have put many people in jail for nonsense. I was in boot camp for the military, when she voted to enter the Iraq war. It is obvious that she is against the environment because she is pro fracking. I have watched her straight up lie, under oath, on more than one occasion. Yet somehow she is supposed to be the next president... Hell no!

This is the era of Internet. Everything you post online will no longer be """"privately"""" yours anymore, that's the harsh truth. The other day, I read news about Taiwanese woman who claimed her life and career are ruined from one picture that is circulated as a meme. I bet more will come forward to claim that their lives have been negatively affected by the multiplication of digital content that has them in it.

First off you don't see emissions coming out of the tailpipe you see steam and particulates and emissions are gases that are usually colorless unless they are in a concentrated area( could be wrong) . The idea this kid has that he wants to do is good but the way he's trying to go about doing it is completely WRONG( if I am mistaken please correct me but they did not really explain how it was supposed to work in the video). Photosynthesis cannot occur without light and the device he's building is completely sealed from light, unless this device uses some high heat resistant algae that doesn't use light they will be killed by the heat of the engine. The algae have to be resistant to the steam the nitric acid , unburned hydrocarbons and the CO that come out of the tailpipe which would take the acid level out of viable range unless he is using extreme volcanic algae. This idea would be better suited in some kind of air purification tower rather than the end of somebody's tailpipe.
